# Appendix 2 - rules of thumb {#app2}

## pH and [H^+^]

[H^+^] = 80 minus the first two digits of pH after the decimal point.  

PaCO~2~: 1 kPa = 7.5 mmHg.  

## Urine specific gravity and UOsm  

300 mOsm per 0.01 units of SG.    

Therefore:  

- SG 1.010 = 300 mOsm
- SG 1.020 = 600 mOsm
- SG 1.030 = 900 mOsm

Caution after radiocontrast.
